title: afni
description: Tool for reading in sessions of 3D datasets and visualizing them

session_directories.title: Session Directories
session_directories.description: Input session directories containing the datasets

bysub.title: By Subject
bysub.description: Gather all datasets corresponding to a single subject identifier

all_dsets.title: All datasets
all_dsets.description: Read in all datasets from all listed folders together

purge.title: Purge Unused Datasets
purge.description: Conserve memory by purging unused datasets

posfunc.title: Positive Function Values
posfunc.description: Start up the color 'pbar' to use only positive function values

recursive.title: Recursive Search
recursive.description: Recursively search each session_directory for more session subdirectories

no1D.title: No 1D timeseries
no1D.description: Tells AFNI not to read *.1D timeseries files

nocsv.title: No CSV files
nocsv.description: Tells AFNI not to read *.csv files

notsv.title: No TSV files
notsv.description: Tells AFNI not to read *.tsv files

unique.title: Unique Colors
unique.description: Create a unique set of colors for each AFNI controller window

orient.title: Orientation Code
orient.description: Orientation code for displaying x-y-z coordinates

debug_plugouts.title: Debug Plugouts
debug_plugouts.description: Plugout code prints lots of messages (for debugging)

layout.title: Layout file
layout.description: Read initial windows layout from a file

niml.title: NIML Data
niml.description: Turn on listening for NIML-formatted data from SUMA

np.title: Port Offset
np.description: Provide a port offset for multiple instances

npq.title: Port Offset Quiet
npq.description: Like -np but quieter in case of errors

npb.title: Port Offset Block
npb.description: Provide a block of port numbers

com.title: Command String
com.description: Specify command strings to drive AFNI on startup

comsep.title: Command Separator
comsep.description: Character to use as a separator for commands
